Bui Minh Canh, 34 years old, was preparing to

when the boat was about to dock,

Liverpool city have become more
bustling and filled with a festive atmosphere than
ever on this day.  December 3 when
thousands of people wearing
Santa Claus costumes participate in the annual fundraising running event. The
running event in Santa Claus costumes
is a
long-standing and very famous Christmas activity in
Liverpool.  Many cities in the US also
organize similar events. The cities will
compete with each other to set a Guinness record
for the place with the most Christmas pots in
2005 and 2016. Liverpool twice set
this record when participating in the program.
Participants are required to wear
red or green Santa costumes. They will
run 5 km around the city collecting
hidden items to compete for the
final grand prizes before the event.
Participants will have to pay  a
small fee to participate. All of
these fees will be used for charitable purposes
at a local di Dong hospital.
In addition to the adult version of the event,
there is also a version for children under
